ComicInfo.Summary: The Black Angel and his forces attack Montcairn Abbey and, despite the best efforts of Deathblow and Sister Mary, succeed in capturing Christopher. Michael discovers that Father O'Conner let him drink from a fake Holy Grail because he did not make a full confession of his sins. Mike fesses up and is allowed to drink from the true Grail to be healed of his cancer. Michael and Mary then prepare to go after the boy.
